text: Collectively , our results show that previously generated EV71 B4 genotype monoclonal antibody , which targeted VP1 linear epitope VC43 and neutralized subgenogroups B4 and B5 strains of EV71 in vitro [ 17 ] , was also able to cross - protect genotype C virus infection in vitro ( Fig . 1 ) and in hSCARB2 - transgenic mouse model . N3 conferred protection through the reduction of viral load and the secretion of proinflammatory cytokines that contributed to viremic injury and immunopathogenesis .
